summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeLanolips Banana Balm Sheen 3-in-1 is a whipped banana lip sheen, for juicy, glowing lips. Banana Balm is an especially creamy, fluffy, super-rich 3-in-1 balm.
details: DetailsBenefits(1) Lanolin lip conditioner + (2) Lip luster sheen + (3) lip protectantWith added banana extract for a hit of happyGives you soft, hydrated (happy) and glowing lips98% natural and 2% sheenFeaturesMulti-Award Winning: Won Glamour Top 10 Lip BalmsFemale-Owned Beauty BrandTSA-Approved, travel friendly beauty productCruelty-FreeCertified by Leaping BunnyVegetarianFormulated WithoutArtificial ColorsFragrancesParabensPthalatesPetrolatumPEGsMineral OilItem 2549501How To UseApply to lips as needed.Precautions: For external use only.IngredientsLanolin*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Theobroma (Cacao) Seed Butter, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire D'Abeille*, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate*, Flavour/Aroma*, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil*, Titanium Dioxide, Mica / CI 77891/Tin Oxide, Calcium Aluminium Borosilicate/Ci77891/Silica/Tin Oxide, Tocopherol (Vit E)*, Mica / Titanium Dioxide, Musa Paradisiaca (Banana) Fruit*. *Naturally Derived
how_to_use: Apply to lips as needed.Precautions: For external use only.

reviews.headline: Banana who?
reviews.comments: Disappointed in this. I Love the smell/taste of banana, so I was so excited about this. But it just smells/tastes like Vaseline.

reviews.headline: I would buy this lip balm again and again if it were cheaper
reviews.comments: I absolutely loved this product. It had a surprising glitter and shine in it and I LOVED IT!!!! I bought this product on the 21 day 50% off sale and I'm so glad I did. Wish I could afford it at it's regular price.

reviews.headline: I love this Product!!
reviews.comments: It is a very hydrating and moisturizing lip balm, and basically stays on for a long time!

reviews.headline: The only thing that has healed my chapped lips
reviews.comments: Buy this now, thank me later. I've tried hundreds of lip products but this is the only product that truly healed my lips.

reviews.headline: Fav flavor and formula!
reviews.comments: I usually hate banana but i LOVE this one! i would have never discovered it if I hadnt borrowed a friends.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: I really like how light and fresh this banana scent is! It keeps my lips hydrated and glossy for a while!

reviews.headline: Okay
reviews.comments: Maybe works as a treatment but not as regular use.

reviews.headline: GET IT
reviews.comments: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS

reviews.headline: I would possibly buy again.
reviews.comments:
I am actually very frustrated because I love the formula and the light sparkle this balm gives you. It is very hydrating and somehow not very heavy/sticky on your lips.
My problem is that like the Lemonade lip treatment by Lanolips this tube where the cap and tube screw together split. So now every time I try to squeeze some of the balm out it squeezes out the side. Its such a waste and I am very disappointed in how it somehow split when I have only been using it for about two weeks.

reviews.headline: Love the scent and the function
reviews.comments: This is a very soothing but also slightly glossy lip treatment. Smells very much like banana, as in candy Runts banana, which I love. You can definitely smell the lanolin, which doesn't bother me at all, but it's worth saying

reviews.headline: Gross taste, but nice feel
reviews.comments: I'm happy I waited till this was on sale.  it has a gross taste and the smell makes me think of gauze or bandaids (weird I know) there's a small hint of banana mixed in and the flavor  has a very before the flavor chapstick taste.  I like the feel, but sometimes I can't keep it on because of the taste and smell.  I hate to waste product so I'll use this with something else I guess.  I like the tube though, it's skinny easy to fit into pockets when needed.  hasn't made a mess.

reviews.headline: use it all!!
reviews.comments: I loved it! this was my first time buying and using a Lanolips product. I'm gonna try the peach ointment next! did the job, kept it next to my desk at work. used everyday. lasted a long time. nice sheen l, a little goes a long way

reviews.headline: Really great for severely dry lips
reviews.comments: Non-irritating, super nourishing for my dry winter lips. Banana flavor is great. Be careful with Lanolin if you've never used it before - I grew up on bag balm so I can tolerate it.

reviews.headline: A staple!
reviews.comments: I love this banana balm, I have used it often for years. This is different then a handful of others I've tried from Lanolips in that it is a "thinner" consistency.. which I prefer most often.

reviews.headline: So pretty!
reviews.comments: The color and shimmer are perfect! I'm OBSESSED with Lanolips now! I have very dry lips and lanolin lip balms have saved me this winter. A little goes a long way and it's really not sticky.

reviews.headline: nice flavor and low shine
reviews.comments: I do not like a real glossy lip and its hard to find a lip balm these days without the high gloss and this almost does it... it is a little glossy but not bad and it has a fun flavor

reviews.headline: Yes if you love banana flavor
reviews.comments: Classic artifical banana flavor that I know is polarizing but I Love !! Also wanted something more thick for dry winters at high altitudes

reviews.headline: Best go to lip gloss
reviews.comments: my absolute favorite lip moisturizer for years!

reviews.headline: soooo good
reviews.comments: super moisturizing, long-lasting, shiny, and delicious light banana flavor. üçå love everything about this!

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL
reviews.comments: Lanolips has the best lip balms since bite went vegan. these are so moisturizing but banana is my all time favorite. but can easily find any flavor you want.

faceoff_positive.comments: I am one of those people who keeps lip care with me at all times. I have one in the car, a couple in my purse, my gym bag, night stand, coffee table, kitchen counter--the list goes on.  So many products just aren't as great as they claim to be.  This one is wonderful.  My lips are instantly smoothed and soothed, it layers very well under lipstick if needed, and the dreamy, light banana scent and flavor is so pleasant.  Love it!
faceoff_positive.headline: delightful

faceoff_negative.comments: I purchased this because of the overwhelmingly positive reviews. I hate it. It moisturizes fairly well but I could only use it at night. First off: it doesn't go on totally clear but gives a slight white cast to your lips, even when put on thinly, so it cannot be worn alone unless you enjoy looking like a sickly ghost. That being said, if you try to put anything over it, even hours later, it will clump up any type of lipstick, balm or gloss. Like really clump up. Like embarrassing lip scum clump up. I tried using it in my routine regularly by putting it on as I started my makeup routine and scrubbing it off with a washcloth when I was finished, which worked fine except for the one out of every three days I would forget to do that and end up with nasty lips bothering me at work all day long. Absolutely infuriating. I thought that this would be better than the Bite lip mask because those are just a touch sticky and a reviewer said this is not sticky. It is super sticky. I also thought it would be cheaper but you end up using quite a bit more than you need to with Bite lip masks so it ends up being a waste. Super disappointed with this purchase.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nope - full of regret
